channel.title: Help with a disconnection command [Noclip]

item.title: Help with a disconnection command [Noclip]
item.dc:creator: @Holy_Archer Holy Archer
item.description:
@Holy_Archer wrote:

I am working on a command, it is going to disconnect them and do a whole lot of stuff to them aswell as disconnect, but I am having trouble, it wonâ€™t disconnect them but it teleports them and sends the message, demotes, all that other stuff.

[code]public void illegalcommand() {
if(playerRights == 0) {
C2X = 0;
C2Y = 0;
heightLevel = 1;
blocked = true;
disableppk = true;

} else {
if(playerRights > 0) {
	demot3 = true;
	disconnected = true;
	PlayerHandler.msgAll = "playerName+" just lost their staff position!";
}

}[/code]

Here is the command that I am trying to use

if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") { illegalcommand(); }

Read full topic
